data.text: Chik iti mondo iwinj wechena, yaye Jehova Nyasaye,
Yie iwinj dwonda gokinyi, yaye Jehova Nyasaye;
Ok in Nyasaye mamor gi timbe maricho.
Josunga ok nyal chungʼ e nyimi;
Telna, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, kuom adiera mari,
Kata wach achiel mowuok e dho jogi ok nyal gen;
We ji duto moketi kar pondo margi obed mamor;
Nikech igwedho joma kare adier, yaye Jehova Nyasaye;
